question: Create a Kubernetes Ingress manifest named 'secure-app-ingress' that routes traffic for the host 'secure.example.com' to the service 'secure-svc' on port 443 using HTTPS.  The Ingress should use the TLS secret named 'secure-tls-secret'.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: secure-app-ingress
spec:
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - secure.example.com
    secretName: secure-tls-secret
  rules:
  - host: secure.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: secure-svc
            port:
              number: 443
